example.code:
Get-IAMOpenIDConnectProvider -OpenIDConnectProviderArn arn:aws:iam::123456789012:oidc-provider/oidc.example.com
ClientIDList CreateDate ThumbprintList Url ------------ ---------- -------------- --- {MyOIDCApp} 2/3/2015 3:00:30 PM {12345abcdefghijk67890lmnopqrst98765uvwxy} oidc.example.com
example.description: This example returns details about the OpenID Connect provider whose ARN is arn:aws:iam::123456789012:oidc-provider/accounts.google.com. The ClientIDList property is a collection that contains all the Client IDs defined for this provider.
